conclusion: Initial problem description with two carts and bullets fired from Cart A to Cart B.
Image shows Cart A moving left at speed v1, Cart B moving right at speed v2, and bullets fired at speed v0.
Determine time for bullet travel between carts using time interval Δt0 and distance s = v1 Δt0.
Calculate time for bullet to travel distance s at speed v0: t = s/v0 = v1 Δt0/v0.
Horizontal distance from Cart A to Cart B is v2 t, leading to equation v2 t = v2 v1 Δt0/v0.
Simplify equation to find relationship between speeds: v2 = v1/v0.
